channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Roundabout falling apart, 27th October
item.description:
The round about plus other equipment is faulty and dirty the round about lifts the ground underneath also plus other equipment

item.title: Persistent graffiti, 27th October
item.description:
Residents were all charged for new bins to be installed - these are now being used as a platform for graffiti. Please remove immediately. Better signage and police presence is also needed.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pownall Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
